newsitem.title: USA: Riviera files for 3.0 mln common shares.
newsitem.headline: Riviera files for 3.0 mln common shares.

text.p: Riviera Holdings Corp filed Tuesday with the Securities and Exchange Commission for up to 3.0 million common shares.
The Las Vegas-based owner and operator of the Riviera Hotel & Casino said that of the total, it will sell up to 1.5 million shares while certain stockholders may offer up to 1.5 million shares.

It said net proceeds will be used to fund expansion of Riviera's present property, acquire interests in financially troubled gaming companies and acquire or develop other gaming properties in Nevada and other areas.
The offering will be made through Ladenburg, Thalmann & Co Inc and Raymond James & Associates Inc. The underwriters have an over-allotment option for up to 450,000 additional shares.
